contentList.content: Hexbloods are individuals infused with eldritch magic, fey energy, or mysterious witchcraft. Some who enter into bargains with hags gain their deepest wishes but eventually find themselves transformed.

Hexbloods are individuals infused with eldritch magic, fey energy, or mysterious witchcraft. Some who enter into bargains with hags gain their deepest wishes but eventually find themselves transformed.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of your choice.
